Race.SpecificTitle: PW Communications Dist. -- 3 Mills - BOC - 10 yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Tensas Parish Communications District (the "District") levy a three (3) mills tax (the "Tax") on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2014 and ending with the year 2023 (an estimated $147,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating an enhanced 911 telephone system, including the payment of indebtedness incurred or to be incurred to provide facilities and/or equipment for the District?
